sections.comments: This course is primarily a part of the MHLP program. MSN Students may be eligible to register after obtaining permission from the MHLP Pillar Director. Email student.services@nursing.ubc.ca for instructions on how to obtain permission.IF course is FULL please contact School of Nursing Student Support Office (academic.support@nursing.ubc.ca)This course focuses on trends, social and institutional policies and practices that influence the health and illness profiles of particular population groups. With a particular focus on seniors; trends in the social organization of service delivery for their impact on the health of seniors.

description: Trends and social and institutional policies and practices that influence the health and illness profiles of particular population groups; trends in the social organization of service delivery for their impact on health.
